entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 3 except minus 2 near the Nunavut border.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow near the Nunavut border. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm near the Nunavut border. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3 except minus 2 near the Nunavut border. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then cloudy. Snow near the Nunavut border. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
